data.title: Titles & Hall of Fame
data.meta_description: Read about titles, championships and hall of fame in the Blue Ridge Christian athletics program.
data.text:
Student-athletes who may be inducted into the hall of fame would have created an athletic resume that would have some of the following characteristics:

Be an example to the student body on and off the playing fields of our school’s core four values: Faith, Integrity, Excellence,Community, Family, Service

Lead their teams to milestone team accomplishments such as championships, final appearances, qualifying for state tournaments, and excellent regular-season records

Finish their career with major recognition from our conferences such as Regional, State, All-Tournament, or MVP honors

Set new statistical records for their program

Students who end their career with the above criteria, will be considered for membership by a group of current and or former coaches of sport specific varsity programs, and the Athletic Department.

Inductees:
